title: FPS dropping in-game
body: My fps have been dropping ever since I did a restore to factory setting on my laptop. I used to get 60 consistently but now, I'm getting 40-50s and 30-40s during team fights. All I did was reboot my laptop. Do you guys know why is that? Thanks in advance.

replies.body:
When you're dropping frames, it can often be caused by driver issues, windows settings, or corrupted/missing game assets. There are a number of other potential causes, however, the guide that *Rineyy* linked will touch the most common solutions. 

Should you still have issues after working through that guide, please let me know.
I also have that problem, I play with 40 fps and it randomly drops to 22 even to 13 sometimes.

Boost your FPS by utilising the **[Frames for days booster.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting)** This booster is legal and is approved by Riot.
